name: Richard Bailey
bio: Richard Bailey has been releasing emotive, ham-fisted electronic music under the pseudonym of 'Proem' since the 1999 release of Burnplate no.1 on Hydrant records. Proem has released a modest collection of full lengths, ep's, and various artist appearances for underground electronic labels such as n5md, merck, hymen, and toytronic.   He currently resides in eastern Pennsylvania working as a UX developer, he moonlights as visual artist for brash beers.
